label: Adhesives and Tapes
description: Products used for bonding and attaching materials together.

subcategories.label: Double-Sided Tape
subcategories.description: Tape with adhesive on both sides for bonding two surfaces together.

subcategories.label: Duct Tape
subcategories.description: Strong, cloth-backed adhesive tape used for a variety of purposes.

subcategories.label: Masking Tape
subcategories.description: Lightweight tape used to cover and protect surfaces during painting or other tasks.

subcategories.label: Adhesive Spray
subcategories.description: Sprayable adhesive used for bonding materials together.

subcategories.label: Silicone Wristbands
subcategories.description: Wristbands made of silicone material, often used for fundraising or awareness purposes.

subcategories.label: Paper Clips
subcategories.description: Small, metal clips used for holding sheets of paper together.

subcategories.label: Rubber Bands
subcategories.description: Elastic bands used for holding items together or securing items in place.

subcategories.label: Wristbands
subcategories.description: Strips of material worn around the wrist for various purposes.

subcategories.label: Inflatables
subcategories.description: Objects that can be inflated with air or gas for various purposes.
